title: Bar Exam Preparation - BarBri PMBR MBE MPT MEE
description:
NOTE: for some reason, this .zip file has had some problems with WinRAR and Windows but has NO problem if opened using 7zip

This is a very thorough and comprehensive set of recycled preparation materials for persons who don't want to pay $6000 to study for the bar exam. First year students may also find this material useful when trying to learn the law instead of listening to professors pontificate on theories that won't matter when it comes time to pass their exam or practice as a lawyer.

Don't buy into the high pressure sales pitch about bar prep course prices going up every year. Don't pad the pockets of professors and schools who act as pushers for companies with a stranglehold monopoly on the market because they get kickbacks. Most importantly, don't chalk up more student loans to pay for bar prep unnecessarily.

An attorney who passed the bar did so because he or she was disciplined with a rigorous study schedule and because he or she learned the material through repetition and regular testing under exam conditions, NOT because he or she attended bar prep classes that read back the outline right in front of them. The law doesn't change THAT much from year-to-year. Bar examiners are testing on general principles in relatively settled areas of law, not novel issues and controversies that some students might unfairly have or have not learned.

You CAN study at home for the bar exam. Much of this collection is compiled from separate torrent files downloaded on TPB. Materials included in this torrent:


Fleming's Multistate Examination Workbook Volume I & II

PMBR Multistate Early Bird MBE Q&A

BarBri Drills and NCBE Released Questions

Answer Sheets that you can print with multiple choice blanks

Bar Outlines - MBE and NY - with 60 day and 3 week study schedules

LEXIS area of law outlines

BarBri Outlines

Conviser Mini Review Outlines

BarBri Audio Lectures

PMBR Outlines

PMBR Audio Lectures

PMBR Flash Cards

New York Distinctions outlined

LawDecks flashcards

Micromash Reviews for the Multistate Bar Examination, Multistate Essay Examination, and Multistate Proficiency Test

Peiper Mnemonics (NY Essays)



Subjects covered:

Civil Procedure
Community Property
Conflicts of Laws
Constitutional Law
Contracts
Contracts Remedies
Corporations
Criminal Law
Criminal Procedure
Evidence
Professional Responsibility
Real Property
Torts
Trusts
Wills
